subject: Football
Telephones and Telecommunications
lead_paragraph: DirecTV renewed its deal as the N.F.L.’s exclusive satellite carrier and will continue to offer the Sunday Ticket package of out-of-market afternoon games from 2011 to 2014. The deal will cost DirecTV $1 billion a year, a leap from $700 million.
snippet: DirecTV renewed its deal as the N.F.L.’s exclusive satellite carrier and will continue to offer the Sunday Ticket package of out-of-market afternoon games from 2011 to 2014. The deal will cost DirecTV $1 billion a year, a leap from $700 million.
